general: Today, dear Leo, it is essential to be attentive to the influence of others on your well-being. The Moon in Gemini and the Sun in Aquarius activate collective energies that may cause you to oscillate between different emotional states. If you feel a certain agitation or if you are overwhelmed by external stimuli, do not hesitate to take a step back. Disconnect from screens and refocus to regain your emotional balance. Enjoy moments of conviviality with friends or allow yourself a bit of flirting this afternoon when Mercury and Venus align.
love: Dare to share your feelings with a special someone, it could lead to magical moments.
work: Stay vigilant against distractions at work; a calm environment will enhance your productivity.
health: Take the time to center yourself; breathing exercises or a short walk can work wonders.
advice: Listen to your instinct and take a break if necessary.
teaser: Balance your emotions and flirt today!
